message.content: {"id": "27869", "title": "Bug 27869 - StyledText overuses Font.getFontData", "description": "Bug 27869 - StyledText overuses Font.getFontData. Btw, UTF8 is the default English encoding for Redhat 8. The FontMetrics API is also heavily used by the StyledText. I believe that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText and updated only when the font is changed.", "OB": "The overuse of Font.getFontData by the StyledText should be addressed to improve performance.", "EB": "I believe, and many people agree, that the StyledText should not use the Font.getFontData API when it is being typed.", "SR": "The StyledText should be optimized to reduce the usage of the Font.getFontData API and instead cache the metric information for improved performance."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '27869', 'title': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData', 'description': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData Btw, UTF8is the default english encoding for Redhat 8.FontMetrics API is also very used by the StyledText, I believe that the metricinformation should be cached in the StyledText and update only when the font ischanged. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "I believe, and many people agree,that this API don't need to be used at all by the StyledText when it's beentyped. ", 'SR': ''}
